ItemRemoveDescription: REMOVE the current Sticker from the match.
ItemBombDescription: If the next guess is a Small Mistake, it will count as correct.
ItemCutDescription: Block one incorrect option per level.
ItemPeekDescription: See how many times each Sticker hast appeared
ItemHighlightDescription: If the next guess is correct, reduce Sticker options for the match.
ItemEnergyPotionDescription: Recharges your energy to the MAX!
UpgradeExtraLifeDescription: Increase the amount of lives you start each game with to <color={textHighlightColor}>{upgradeLevel|+3}</color>.
UpgradeLifeProtectorDescription: Protect your life from one mistake. Recharges on <color={textHighlightColor}>{upgradeLevel|-11} COMBO
UpgradeBetterClueDescription: Clues mark the number they were used on.
UpgradeHealOnClearDescription: Heal one heart every <color={textHighlightColor}>{upgradeLevel|-5} stickers cleared</color>.
UpgradeBlockMistakeDescription: On mistake, add a <color={textHighlightColor}>Cut lv. {upgradeLevel}</color> to the sticker.
UpgradeDeathDefyDescription: Cheat death on a SMALL mistake once per lv
UpgradeStickerMasterDescription: Stickers on match come with bonuses, per sticker level
UpgradeConsumableSlotDescription: Allows you to bring <color={textHighlightColor}>{upgradeLevel} extra consumables</color> to the match, and store <color={textHighlightColor}>{upgradeLevel|*3} extra consumables</color> on each factory.
